name: Suddenly Seeking Susan
description:
Join Captain Susan The 13th as she tries one last chance to get away with the goods. You only get one command. Made in about 24 hours. There's 15 endings. Have fun.

Made for Pirate Jam Pre-Skirmish 2020

Requires Gluxle to run. Can be found here

An online version is here and you can download the command/ending spoiler sheet from here as "susan spoilers.txt"
